trans-unit.source: Represents an element that has a value within a specific range.
trans-unit.target: 代表具有特定範圍內的值的項目。

trans-unit.source: A RangeBase control has a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> that can be set between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: RangeBase 控制項有<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>可以之間設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: The RangeBase visually indicates its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>.
trans-unit.target: RangeBase 以視覺效果指示其<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: In some cases, the user can interactively set the value; in other cases, the value can be set only programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 在某些情況下，使用者可以互動方式設定的值;在其他情況下，可以只以程式設計方式設定值。

trans-unit.source: The user can set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, but not the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>.
trans-unit.target: 使用者可以設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>，但不是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value to be added to or subtracted from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，即可加入或減去<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref>控制項。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: A control that inherits from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> determines how this property is used.
trans-unit.target: 控制項是繼承自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>決定如何使用這個屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: When the user clicks the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track> of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> property increases or decreases by the value of LargeChange.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者按一下<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar>、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>屬性增加或減少值的 LargeChange。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ScrollBar> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.Track>

trans-unit.source: When the user invokes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseLarge%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IncreaseLarge%2A> commands on a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueProperty> of the slider changes by the value of LargeChange.
trans-unit.target: 當使用者叫用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseLarge%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IncreaseLarge%2A>命令<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>、 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueProperty>LargeChange 值的滑桿變更。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.ValueProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.IncreaseLarge%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider.DecreaseLarge%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar> does not use this property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>不使用這個屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.target: <>*> 來加入或減去<> *> 的<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: The default is 1.
trans-unit.target: 預設為 1。

trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.LargeChange*>

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the highest possible <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*> of the range element.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的最高的可能<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>範圍項目。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value*>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider> overrides the metadata of this property and sets its default to 10.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>覆寫這個屬性的中繼資料，並設定其預設值為 10。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Slider>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar> overrides the metadata of this property and sets its default to 100.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>覆寫這個屬性的中繼資料，並將其預設設定為 100。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ProgressBar>

trans-unit.source: Provides a string representation of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 提供的字串表示法<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a string that provides the values of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會傳回提供之值的字串<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>，和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Value%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: Returns the string representation of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回的字串表示法<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the current magnitude of the range control.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定目前範圍控制項的大小。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase> control visually indicates the Value property in some way.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>控制項以視覺化方式表示以某種方式的 Value 屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase>

trans-unit.source: For example, the slider and scrollbar controls have a thumb that is synchronized with the Value of the control.
trans-unit.target: 例如，「 滑桿和捲軸控制項有 thumb 控制項的值與同步處理。

trans-unit.source: If you set Value to a number that is less than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> property, Value is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將值設成低於的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>屬性值設定為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Minimum%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you set Value to a number that is greater than the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> property, Value is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 如果您將值設定為一個數字，大於&1; 的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>屬性值設定為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.RangeBase.Maximum%2A>
